Ferroseed (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0596: Galvantula
Pokémon
#0598: Ferrothorn →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Ferroseed (TCG Pocket).

Ferroseed has been featured on 10 different cards since it debuted in the Emerging Powers expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Ferroseed cards are normally Metal-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Ferroseed

Ferroseed
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Ferroseed Emerging Powers 70/98 White Collection 038/053
Ferroseed Emerging Powers 71/98 Cobalion Battle Strength Deck   003/014
Ferroseed Next Destinies 77/99 Psycho Drive 043/052
Ferroseed BREAKpoint 79/122 Rage of the Broken Heavens 059/080
Ferroseed Team Up 102/181 Dark Order 037/052
Ferroseed Sword & Shield 130/202 Sword 042/060
Ferroseed Vivid Voltage 123/185 Amazing Volt Tackle 078/100
Ferroseed Silver Tempest 121/195 Lost Abyss 076/100
Ferroseed Paradox Rift 127/182 Raging Surf 043/062
Ferroseed White Flare 068/086 White Flare 063/086
White Flare 148/086 White Flare 144/086


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
